1 var Stacktrace	= Stacktrace	|| require('../src/stacktrace')
  2 
  3 /**
  4  * @namespace
  5  * http://stackoverflow.com/questions/367768/how-to-detect-if-a-function-is-called-as-constructor
  6  */
  7 var AllocationTracker	= new Stacktrace.Tracker();
  8 
  9 // export the class in node.js - if running in node.js
 10 if( typeof(window) === 'undefined' )	module.exports	= AllocationTracker;
 11
